item.title: Funny: Microsoft Goes Chick-Flick
item.description: My wife saw this on my laptop screen while we were on a plane trip. She pointed to it, and said “Awwwww!!” as if I were reading a book on relationships rather than a technical pdf going over general SCOM 2007 concepts. Microsoft gets a bit soft...
